mapper.select: SELECT id, customer_code, name, postal_code, first_address, second_address, third_address, phone_number, created_at, updated_at, invalid FROM customers

SELECT id, customer_code, name, postal_code, first_address, second_address, third_address, phone_number, created_at, updated_at, invalid FROM customers
customer_code LIKE '%${customerCode}%'
AND name LIKE '%${name}%'
AND ( first_address LIKE '%${address}%' OR second_address LIKE '%${address}%' OR third_address LIKE '%${address}%' )
SELECT id, customer_code, name, postal_code, first_address, second_address, third_address, phone_number, created_at, updated_at, invalid FROM customers WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, customer_code, name, postal_code, first_address, second_address, third_address, phone_number, created_at, updated_at, invalid FROM customers WHERE customer_code = #{customer_code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customers ( customer_code, name, postal_code, first_address, second_address, third_address, phone_number ) VALUES ( #{customerCode}, #{name}, #{postalCode}, #{firstAddress}, #{secondAddress}, #{thirdAddress}, #{phoneNumber} )
mapper.update: UPDATE customers SET customer_code = #{customerCode}, name = #{name}, postal_code = #{postalCode}, first_address = #{firstAddress}, second_address = #{secondAddress}, third_address = #{thirdAddress}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE customers SET invalid = 1, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
